chunk_analysis.page_text:
DEED

This Deed is made on June 21, 1990

Prepared by: JOANNE D. KAY, ESQUIRE

BETWEEN AUGUSTINE CERRONE and CLAIRE CERRONE, husband and wife

RECORDED JUL 16 1990
11:02 AM

whose address is 2900 Park Boulevard, Wildwood, New Jersey 08260
referred to as the Grantor,

AND AUGUSTINE CERRONE, married man, as to an undivided one-half interest and EDWARD CERRONE, married man, as to the remaining undivided one-half interest; each one-half interest being held as joint tenants with right of survivorship

whose post office address is 235 West Magnolia Avenue, Wildwood, New Jersey 08260
referred to as the Grantee.

The words "Grantor" and "Grantee" shall mean all Grantors and all Grantees listed above.

Transfer of Ownership. The Grantor grants and conveys (transfers ownership of) the property described below to the Grantee. This transfer is made for the sum of ONE ($1.00) DOLLAR. The Grantor acknowledges receipt of this money.

Tax Map Reference. (N.J.S.A. 46:15-2.1) Municipality of Hector
Parcel #130-002-04-4

Property. The property consists of the land and all the buildings and structures on the land in the Township of Hector County of Potter and State of Pennsylvania. The legal description is:

BEGINNING at a corner in the centerline of the Township Road T-443 at the Northeast corner of Lot #4 as shown on the plan made for the Grantors herein prepared by A.J. Kice, Jr., R.S., dated October 8, 1973; thence from the point of beginning along the North line of Lot #4, South 89 degrees, 45 minutes, 10 seconds West, 1,328.16 feet to a corner being the Northwest corner of Lot #4; thence North 01 degree, 00 minutes West, 442.75 feet to a corner being the Southwest corner of Lot #2; thence South 89 degrees, 02 minutes, 45 seconds East, 1,326.24 feet to a corner in the centerline of T-443; thence along said center, South 01 degree, 23 minutes East, 415.00 feet to the point and place of beginning.

CONTAINING 13.06 acres of land.

BEING THE SAME land and premises which Clyde L. Rohrer and Eleane F. Rohrer, husband and wife, by a Deed dated June 29, 1976 and recorded on June 29, 1976 in the Office of the Clerk of Potter County in Volume 198 page 854 granted and conveyed unto Augustine Cerrone and Claire Cerrone, husband and wife, parties of the first part hereto, in fee.

EXCEPTING AND RESERVING the oil, gas and minerals underlying the above described premises, as reserved in prior deeds.

THE WITHIN CONVEYANCE is made under and subject to the reservations and restrictions of record in the Potter County Clerk's Office.

I hereby certify that the residence of the Grantee is 106 Mathemek Street, North Cape May, New Jersey 08204.

detailed_samples.reasoning: This deed contains an actual mineral rights reservation, specifically found in this substantive clause:
This deed contains an actual mineral rights reservation, specifically identified in this key passage:
